entry.string: The AuthLDAP module allows you to authenticate a user with an LDAP server. The AuthLDAP module forwards the username and password from the login screen to the LDAP server for authentication.
entry.translation: Zee OothLDEP mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu oozeenteecete-a a user veet un LDEP serfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Zee OothLDEP mudoole-a furverds zee userneme-a und pessvurd frum zee lugeen screee tu zee LDEP serfer fur oozeenteeceshun.

entry.string: Authentication by AuthLDAP is automatically set once the the AuthLDAP module has been initialized. You must configure XarLDAP before a user will be able to login to Xaraya. To remove AuthLDAP authentication, you must remove the module.
entry.translation: Oozeenteeceshun by OothLDEP is ootumeteecelly set oonce-a zee zee OothLDEP mudoole-a hes beee ineetielized. Bork bork bork! Yuoo moost cunffeegoore-a XerLDEP beffure-a a user veell be-a eble-a tu lugeen tu Xereya. Tu remufe-a OothLDEP oozeenteeceshun, yuoo moost remufe-a zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice. "Modify Config".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a. "Mudeeffy Cunffeeg".

entry.string: Modify Config -- From here, you can allow a user that has account information in LDAP to be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeeg -- Frum here-a, yuoo cun elloo a user thet hes eccuoont inffurmeshun in LDEP tu be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: There are no included blocks with the AuthLDAP Module
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet zee OothLDEP Mudoole
